article:
My English name is David. I am short  _  black hair. I am from China. Frank is my classmate and neighbour. He is tall and has black hair. He  _  from the USA, and now he is in Beijing.
Frank and I have different  _  habits. He likes having fruit and vegetables very much,  _  I only like meat. Coke is Frank's favourite  _ , but I like tea best. I look much fatter than him.
Frank often  gets up  early and does sports. I like staying in my bedroom and  _ computer games. I often have a cold. When I am ill, I always stay at home and take some  _ . The doctor asks me to take  _  often, but it is difficult for me to get up early. At last, Frank has an idea. He calls  _  in the morning every day, and then we do some sports together.
